testcase.classname: User is able to use all functions of the BCBS Homepage
testcase.name: User is able to access the contact us from header
testcase.system-out: Given User is at the home page..............................................passed When User clicks on Contact us..............................................passed Then User is redirected to Contact Us page..................................passed And User verfiyies the customer call center phone number....................passed

testcase.name: User is able use the search functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User is at the home page..............................................passed When user enters "Breast Cancer" in the search box and presses Enter........passed Then user is on a page with appropriate "https://www.bcbs.com/search/Breast%20Cancer" page.passed And user can clear the search box and search for another topic..............passed
